title: African Burial Ground National Monument: Virtual Open House
body: Virtual Open House       Virtual Open House: November 2009 Welcome to African Burial Ground National Monument's Virtual Open House. Below are links to PDFs of the posters that were used at the physical open houses in Harlem, Brooklyn and at the monument. Welcome About the African Burial Ground Join Us What We Heard and Learned Foundation for Planning Preliminary Alternatives Planning Process Please share your ideas and comments with us. Information on the new Visitor Center planned to open early 2010 (floor plan).
